Mechanics

  • How are forces applied?
  • Scientific notation exists
  • Use given amount of sigfigs -
    • round result to least
  • Fundamental units are Length ($L$), Time ($T$), and Mass ($M$)
    • Distances → meters
    • Time → seconds
    • Mass → kilograms
    • (should be able to convert to imperial)
